title: What's news in v2.23.0
content:
Features:
  - Fun mode
  - Sampling (or referencing) layer for color bucket
  - Layer row color
  - Onion skin over content mode

Enhancements:
  - Added enhanced hover tooltip for a few buttons
  - Side-docked layer panel is pushed to be right on the screen edge
  - The main color picker can be expanded even bigger
  - Better crash reporting to help with troubleshooting

Fixes:
  - Side-docked layer panel's button being overlapped by the toolbox
